properties.areaDesc: Marengo, AL; Greene, AL; Hale, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 14 at 9:08AM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The flood warning is cancelled for the Black Warrior River At
Oliver Lock and Dam...
...The flood warning continues for the Black Warrior River At Selden
Lock and Dam...

.Levels are now falling at Oliver Lock and Dam...and this trend will
spread downstream during the next few days.

The Flood Warning continues for
The Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam.
* until further notice...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 8:45 AM Friday the stage was 103.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 90 feet.
* Moderate flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 103.8 feet by
this afternoon and then begin falling.
* Impact...At 105 feet...Severe residential flooding occurs in the
area...and evacuations may become necessary. At 102
feet...Residential flooding begins in the area. Numerous cabins
and trailers in Hale and Greene counties become flooded.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Saturday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
